title: WHIG Congressional Deception and Legislative Manipulation Campaigns
description: Research how the White House Iraq Group systematically deceived Congress through coordinated briefings, classified intelligence presentations, and legislative liaison activities designed to secure authorization for Iraq War. Investigate Nicholas Calio's role as WHIG legislative liaison, coordination between WHIG messaging and congressional briefings, manipulation of classified intelligence presentations to Congress, and systematic deception of both parties' leadership. Document how WHIG transformed constitutional war powers into a propaganda-driven rubber stamp process.
